description:
"One minute to go."  Gon, Killua, Knuckle, Shoot, Melereon, and the others are waiting inside the Four-dimension Apartment.  Morel tells the Hunters to prepare for the attack.  Two minutes earlier, two glowing lights descended upon the Republic of East Gorteau.  Neferpitou was the first to notice them. "Something`s coming."  A few seconds later, Neferpitou`s hunch was confirmed. "The enemy!" A giant dragon drops out of the clouds. The final battle pitting human against Chimera Ant is about to begin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: トツニュウ×シテ×シンニュウ
